cherry_blossom_snowball.tooltip: Embedded a few cherry blossom petals
critical_frozen_snowball.tooltip: Powerfully freeze surrounding creatures and blocks, generating critical snow
reconstruct_snowball.tooltip: Generate ephemeral snow walls along the trajectory
snow_storage_snowball.tooltip: Instantly absorbs the surrounding snow and stores it inside when throwing it.
ghost_snowball.tooltip: Can penetrate obstacles, causing the target to be engulfed by darkness
snowman_in_hand2.tooltip: <%1$s> Absorb any snow to fill the snow storage capacity
jedi_glove.tooltip: Catch the snowball flying towards you without touching
snow_trap_setter.tooltip: Press and hold to place traps on the snow
snowball_clamp.tooltip: Compress the snow into a snowball
guns1.tooltip: Can launch the snowballs from the snowball tank
snowball_cannon2.tooltip: Snowball comes with a freezing slow effect
snowball_cannon2_1.tooltip: Significantly enhance the effect of ice-type snowballs
snowball_cannon3.tooltip: The snowball moves faster and will apply a weakening effect to the target
compacted_snowball_set.tooltip: Throw three compacted snowballs at once
milk_popsicle.tooltip: Extinguish the flames on body and remove the potion effects
snowball_machine_gun2.tooltip: Can only launch the snowballs from the snowball tank
snowball_storage_tank.tooltip: Can store a large number of snowballs
snowball_storage_tank1.tooltip: The off-hand holds the tank, the main hand holds the snowball and uses it to load the snowball into the tank
snowball_storage_tank2.tooltip: Off-hand empty, main hand holding tank and using it to take out snowballs
ice_skates.tooltip: Moves faster on ice, hindered on non-ice surfaces
black_hole_snowball.tooltip: Embedded a timed self-destruct singularity suppressor
monster_gravity_snowball.tooltip: Embedded a targeted gravitational field generator, tracking monster
monster_repulsion_snowball.tooltip: Embedded a targeted repulsion field generator, tracking monster
projectile_gravity_snowball.tooltip: Embedded a targeted gravitational field generator, tracking projectiles
projectile_repulsion_snowball.tooltip: Embedded a targeted repulsion field generator, tracking projectiles
EMT_snowball.tooltip: Deflect the flight path towards the monster's location and equip a block of TNT
EPT_snowball.tooltip: Deflect the flight path towards the rival's location and equip a block of TNT
HMT_snowball.tooltip: Deflect the flight path towards the monster's location and equip a counterweights
HPT_snowball.tooltip: Deflect the flight path towards the rival's location and equip a counterweights
LMT_snowball.tooltip: Deflect the flight path towards the monster's location
LPT_snowball.tooltip: Deflect the flight path towards the rival's location
snowball_shotgun2.tooltip: <%1$s> Firing consumes ammunition and generates significant recoil
snowball_shotgun3.tooltip: The magnitude of the recoil is determined by the type of snowball
basin0.tooltip: Can holding snow and throwing it forward
basin1.tooltip: The thrown snow will clog the weapon, rendering the target unable to use weapon for a short time
powder_snowball.tooltip: Produce a flurry of snowflakes to hinder sight
snow_block_blender.tooltip: Stir the snow chunks into powder snow
subspace_snowball1.tooltip: Embedded a dimensional scaler, can capture surrounding snowballs and store them internally
subspace_snowball2.tooltip: [Restore Mode](default) Release snowball item after hitting the block
subspace_snowball3.tooltip: [Collapse Mode] Capturing snowballs can accelerate oneself and tear space upon impact
snow_fall_boots.tooltip: Eliminate damage from falling on the snow
snow_fall_boots1.tooltip: Enchanting:[%1$s] Gain acceleration based on falling height
repulsive_field_generator.tooltip: Generate a capture field to stop and rebound the snowball
snow_golem_mode_tweaker2.tooltip: Right-click Advanced Snow Golem entry settings
target_locator.tooltip: Launch targeted snowballs using iron snowballs as ammunition
target_locator1.tooltip: After hitting the target, it implants a tracking chip and establishes communication
target_locator2.tooltip: Use on the Advanced Snow Golem to write the stored targeting channel into it
smart_snow_block1.tooltip: Place a smart snow block on two snow blocks to spawn an advanced snow golem
smart_snow_block3.tooltip: Right-click with the weapon/snowball tank/golem core to equip the advanced snow golem
smart_snow_block4.tooltip: Advanced Snow Golems can only use the Snowball Cannon/Snowball Shotgun to fire snowballs from the tank
smart_snow_block5.tooltip: Right-click with an empty hand to remove the tank, hold shift and right-click with an empty hand to remove the weapon
smart_snow_block6.tooltip: Use the Golem Core Remover to right-click and remove the core
smart_snow_block8.tooltip: Modify the mode using the target locator and snow golem mode tweaker
smart_snow_block10.tooltip: Feed smooth snowballs, snow blocks, and powder snow to restore health
smart_snow_block11.tooltip: Feeding Ice grants a regeneration effect
smart_snow_block12.tooltip: Have cooldown period for the buff
smart_snow_block14.tooltip: Using the vanilla Snowball can switch skins
creative_snow_golem_tool.tooltip: Right-click the Advanced Snow Golem to activate Enhanced Mode
creative_snow_golem_tool1.tooltip: Hold Shift and right-click to copy Advanced Snow Golem, right-click on a block to generate
thrust_snowball1.tooltip: Cannot be launched, only provides thrust for the Snowball Shotgun/Implosion Snowball Cannon
thrust_snowball2.tooltip: When the snowball shotgun advances with recoil, it will automatically prioritize consuming thrust snowballs
ender_snowball.tooltip: Swap the target hit with the thrower
thrust_golem_core.tooltip: Generate thrust to launch golem when approached by the target.
swiftness_golem_core.tooltip: Increase the speed of the golem.
regeneration_golem_core.tooltip: Regain golem's health if not attacked for a period of time.
critical_snow_golem_core.tooltip: Generate critical snow along golem's movement path
repulsive_field_golem_core.tooltip: Let all nearby projectiles fly towards the target.
near_teleportation_golem_core.tooltip: Teleports to escape when approached by the target
ender_teleportation_golem_core.tooltip: Teleports before being hit by a projectile
active_teleportation_golem_core.tooltip: Actively teleports to behind the target
implosion_snowball_cannon.tooltip: Consume thrust snowball to push all entities ahead
implosion_snowball_cannon1.tooltip: It will destroy the loose snow forms snowballs
cold_compression_jet_engine1.tooltip: Standing on the snow will automatically recharge
vector_inversion_anchor.tooltip: Reverse the velocity of all entities within the vicinity

advancements.bsf.popsicle_consume.descri: Eat a popsicle or milk popsicle
